quotes.quote: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There is nothing permanent except change.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: The only journey is the one within.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: We judge ourselves by our intentions and others by their actions.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Seek first to understand, then to be understood.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: A single raindrop never feels responsible for the flood.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Don't make permanent decisions based on temporary feelings.
Victory does not favor the righteous nor the wicked; it favors the prepared.
A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for.
quotes.author: John A. Shedd

quotes.quote: A master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried.
Worrying means you suffer twice.
quotes.author: Newt Scamander

quotes.quote: Every saint has a past, and every sinner has a future.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Man cannot remake himself without suffering, for he is both the marble and the sculptor.
quotes.author: Alexis Carrel

quotes.quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
quotes.author: Jenn Proske

quotes.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Lovers who love truly do not write down their happiness.
quotes.author: Antole France

quotes.quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and nothing else.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: It is better to be feared than loved, if you cannot be both.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: There is no charm equal to tenderness of heart.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.
quotes.author: Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Love cures people - both the ones who give it and the ones who receive it.
quotes.author: Karl A. Menninger

quotes.quote: When you compare your insides to other people's outsides, you always lose.
Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: A good teacher can inspire hope, ignite the imagination, and instill a love of learning.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
True love cannot be find where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.
quotes.author: Torquato Tasso

quotes.quote: Never make a decision when you are upset, sad, jealous, or in love.
quotes.author: Mario Teguh

quotes.quote: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.
quotes.author: A. J. McLean

quotes.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: The art of communication is the language of leardership.
quotes.author: James Humes

quotes.quote: Oh, thou art fairer than the evening air clad in the beauty of a thousand stars.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.quote: Learning never exhausts the mind.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
quotes.author: Satchel Paige

quotes.quote: Youth is the gift of nature, but age is a work of art.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: In art, the hand can never execute anything higher than the heart can imagine.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
quotes.author: Henri Poincare

quotes.quote: Art, freedom and creativity will change society faster than politics.
quotes.author: Victor Pinchuk

quotes.quote: Love the art in yourself and not yourself in the art.
quotes.author: Constantin Stanislavski

quotes.quote: The art of simplicity is a puzzle of complexity.
quotes.author: Douglas Horton

quotes.quote: Some painters transform the sun into a yellow spot, others transform a yellow spot into the sun.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: This world is but a canvas to our imagination.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Without tradition, art is a flock of sheep without a shepherd. Without innovation, it is a corpse.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The enemy of art is the absence of limitations.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: I don't want life to imitate art. I want life to be art.
quotes.author: Ernst Fischer

quotes.quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Medicine is a science of uncertainty and an art of probability.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: Blue thou art, intensely blue; Flower, whence came thy dazzling hue?
quotes.author: James Montgomery

quotes.quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Accept the terrible responsibility of life with eyes wide open.
quotes.author: Jordan Peterson

quotes.quote: Do not mind anything that anyone tells you about anyone else. Judge everyone and everything for yourself.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Good judgement comes from experience, and a lot of that comes from bad judgement.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Independence is happiness.
quotes.author: Susan B. Anothony

quotes.quote: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Even the longest days are twenty-four hours.
Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.quote: Because of your smile, you make life more beautiful.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: There are two great days in a person's life - the day we are born and the day we discover why.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes the air smell better.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.
quotes.author: Kareena Kapoor Khan

quotes.quote: My life motto is 'Do my best, so that I can't blame myself for anything.'
quotes.author: Magdalena Neuner

quotes.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Don't ruin a Tuesday wishing it was Friday.
I wish there was a way to know you're in the good old days before you've actually left them.
quotes.author: Andy Bernard

quotes.quote: You're not in traffic, you are traffic.
You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know.
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: There are only three things women need in life: food, water, and compliments.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: When we ask for advice, we are usually looking for an accomplice.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in th morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: It takes considerable knowledge just to realize the extent of your own ignorance.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Go to Heaven for the climate, Hell for the company.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
quotes.author: Luis Bunuel

quotes.quote: I haven't spoken to my wife in years. I didn't want to interrupt her.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield
